title: E3 2005 (your thoughts)
content:
Well this years E3 has gone and past and so what are you looking forward to now?
For me:

Kingdom Hearts 2:
The game looks stunning and it looks like it will improve heavily on the first game.

Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess:
Another amazing game. The realistic Zelda game for gamecube that seems to take elements from Ocarina of time but with brand new elements like horseback battles and transforming into a wolf.

Sonic Rush:
A sonic game for DS thats has 3d graphics in 2d styled gameplay. The camera in boss fights definatly reminds me of viewtiful joe's camera style.

The end is near. An evil force returns. And only Commander Keen can stop him, but this time he must team up with a super sonic hedgehog and a two tailed fox. Follow the adventure:[url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario/chaos.html]Dimension Chaos[/url]
A Commander Keen and Sonic The Hedgehog Crossover Fan Fiction

Visit my website at [url=http://www.geocities.com/superadammario]www.geocities.com/superadammario[/url]

title: yep
content: I'm going to have to invest in a Nintendo DS, just for Animal Crossing DS, New Super Mario Bros., and the Mario Kart thing.  :-) This oughta be fun.

title: Duke Nukem and HL2
content:
BluesNews is a pretty nice resource...
[url=http://www.bluesnews.com/cgi-bin/board.pl?action=viewthread&threadid=57161]www.bluesnews.com/cgi-bin...adid=57161[/url]
(regarding HL2 - Aftermath)

George Broussard of 3drealms has said something similar to "we're not sure we will ever go to e3 again." Due to not wanting any extra hype and finding little use for it as far as they are concerned. (Duke Nukem doesn't really need the extra publicity.)

If you followed 3dRealms/Apogee games around 1998/99, you might remember they were working on that game "Prey" that was basically cancelled. They've got some other company making that game, under their direction. That got a lot of positive reaction at e3 this year.

title: Re:
content: I hope the Nintendo Revolution does well. It sounds like it shall be awesome.
